xxl.core.io.fat.util
Interface ExtendedFileFilter

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.FileFilter
public interface ExtendedFileFilter
extends java.io.FileFilter

A filter for pathnames. Instances of this interface may be passed to the listFiles(ExtendedFileFilter) method of the ExtendedFileFilter class.

Method Summary
 boolean accept(ExtendedFile pathname)
          Tests whether or not the specified pathname should be included in a pathname list.

Method Detail

accept

boolean accept(ExtendedFile pathname)
Tests whether or not the specified pathname should be included in a pathname list.

Parameters:
pathname - the pathname to be tested.
Returns:
true if and only if pathname should be included.
